name: Solar Sailor
description:
Solar Sailor is a game made for the July 2015 One Game a Month challenge. Explore a randomly generated star system, all the while fleeing from the ever expanding sun. Aqcuire resources and save as many people from a fiery demise as you can.

Controls

'a' and 'd' or left and right to rotate, 'w', up, or space to thrust. Escape to pause, 'm' to mute music.
